titles.title: To authorize a land conveyance at the former Department of Labor Job Corps Training Center, Jacksonville, Florida.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 3/29/2006--Introduced. Authorizes the Administrator of General Services to convey for municipal government purposes, including economic development, the property known as the Department of Labor Job Corps Training Center in Duval County, Florida, to the city of Jacksonville, after the existing Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) leasehold interest terminates.
